p: The results of the current study are consistent with what it confirmed by (SAS, 2020) that the teacher is increasing their students' awareness through using the technology effectively, including distance learning. It also agrees with what UNICEF (2020) called for, to educate students and provide them with basic information about COVID‐19, its implications, methods of transmission, and how to prevent its transmission. UNICEF also called for critical thinking among students in interacting with false information about COVID‐19 being circulated.
